name: Too Hot to Sleep
description:
Too Hot to Sleep is a cozy, intimate two-person LARP about cuddling with the monster from under your bed. Gameplay requires a Sleeper, a Monster, a bed, and a blanket.

When the monster under your bed grabs your ankle, ask for a foot rub. Tease the flaming specter that haunts the hallways with an ice cube. Give the drowned and dripping ghost your most colorful beach towel. #HotHorrorJam
— 🌿 semiprofessional nature queer 🌿 (@adanarama) August 5, 2019
